Follow the Cyborg

Follow the Cyborg is the debut album from New York-based artist Miss Grit.

Artists
  • Miss Grit
Genres
  • Alt-rock
Type LP
Published February 24, 2023
Links
  • https://missgrit.bandcamp.com/album/follow-the-cyborg
  • https://open.spotify.com/album/1FzCOEjfRrJvwMWqEUCsNO?si=zb-LIBH9SKO-uPGVQJwSZA

Follow the Cyborg explores gender, cybernetics, and personal identity through quirky, deeply personal alt-rock.

Tracks

  • Perfect Blue
  • Your Eyes Are Mine
  • Nothing's Wrong
  • Lain (Phone Clone)
  • Buffering
  • Follow the Cyborg
  • 사이보그를 따라와
